dict.acceptation: 量，数量；总额；本利之和；全部效果，全部含义；
（在意义、价值、效果、程度等方面）等于；等同，接近；合计，总共；发展成为；

sent.orig: As a result, amount received by you may possibly less than the original amount remitted.
sent.trans: 因此，您所收电汇款金额就有可能少于原汇出金额。

sent.orig: This involves the automatic currency exchange, how will the amount of renminbi into HK amount.
sent.trans: 这涉及货币的自动兑换，如何将人民币金额转化为港币金额。

sent.orig: He found that a given amount of mechanical energy invariably produced the same amount of heat.
sent.trans: 他发现一定量的机械能会恒定地产生等量的热。

sent.orig: Net assets are the difference between the amount of assets and the amount of liabilities.
sent.trans: 净资产是指企业的资产总额减去负债总额后的余额。

sent.orig: The displacement amount and vertical displacement amount of ground buildings generated by coal tunnel are got.
sent.trans: 结果分析认为，地下巷道的存在不会对上部建筑物造成威胁，仅会产生微小沉降变形。
